root.name: Funky Lab Rat
root.description: OverviewFunky Lab Rat is a puzzle-platformer that stars Diego, a lab rat who has decided to escape the confines of his wacky laboratory. There are 81 levels spread across 10 worlds, each filled with collectible "pills". The game features PlayStation Move support, but it is not required, as it supports normal controllers as well. A major feature of the game is players can pause rewind time (much like in Braid) to retry any moment in the game.
